i1.blurb: When he hasn't recently taken damage or been crowd controlled, Malzahar gains massive damage reduction and crowd control immunity, lingering for a short period after taking damage. Damage from lane minions is unaffected.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Malzahar''' receives ''Void Shift'' if he hasn't taken damage nor been affected by {{tip|crowd control}} in the last {{pp|4|30|24|18|12|1|6|11|16}} seconds. Damage from {{tip|minions}} does not interact with ''Void Shift''.
''Void Shift'' phases out '''Malzahar''', making him immune to crowd control and taking 90% reduced damage, lingering for {{fd|0.25}} seconds after taking damage or blocking a crowd control effect.
i1.name: Void Shift
notes: * ''Void Shift'' will not mitigate true damage but the buff will be still consumed.
* Damage from [[monster]]s does interact with ''Void Shift''.

q1.blurb: Malzahar opens up two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal Magic Damage and silence enemy champions.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a {{fd|0.25}}-second cast time, '''Malzahar''' opens two portals that are each 200 units {{tt|perpendicular|Relative to his facing direction.}} from the target location. After a {{fd|0.4}}-seconds delay, all enemies between the portals take {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} and are {{tip|silence|silenced}}.
q1.name: Call of the Void
notes: * ''Call of the Void'' provides vision of a small area around it.

w1.blurb: Malzahar summons Voidlings to attack nearby enemies.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Malzahar''' gains a stack of ''Gathering Swarm'' when he casts another spell, up to a maximum of 2.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Malzahar''' consumes all ''Gathering Swarm'' stacks and, after a {{fd|0.5}}-second delay, summons a ''Voidling'' at the target location. Additional ''Voidlings'' are then summoned for each ''Gathering Swarm'' stack consumed.
''Voidlings'' deal {{as|magic damage}} with their attacks. ''Voidlings'' deal 50% damage to epic [[monster]]s, and 300% damage against lane minions affected by {{ai|Malefic Visions|Malzahar}}.
w1.name: Void Swarm
notes: * ''Gathering Swarm'' stacks are gained per cast and not per ability activation. I.e if {{ai|Malefic Visions|Malzahar}} is casted but loses its target during its cast time the ability will not activate nor go on cooldown, but a ''Gathering Swarm'' stack will still be granted.

e1.blurb: Malzahar infects his target's mind with cruel visions of their demise, dealing damage over time. Using Malzahar's other spells on the target will refresh the visions. If the target dies while afflicted by the visions, they pass on to a nearby enemy unit and Malzahar gains Mana. Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Malzahar''' infects the target enemy's mind, dealing them {{as|magic damage}} every half second over 4 seconds. Damaging a target with {{ai|Call of the Void|Malzahar}} or {{ai|Nether Grasp|Malzahar}} will refresh the duration of ''Malefic Visions''.
If the target dies during this time, they pass ''Malefic Visions'' onto the closest enemy, refreshing the duration and restoring {{sti|mana|{{as|2% of '''Malzahar's''' '''maximum''' mana}}}}.
leveling: {{st|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|80 to 220}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}|Magic Damage Per Half Second|{{ap|80/8 to 220/8}} {{as|(+ {{fd|10%}} AP)}}}}
e1.name: Malefic Visions
notes: * {{ai|Void Swarm|Malzahar|Voidlings}} will automatically attack the nearest target affected by ''Malefic Visions'' (prioritizing champions) if no target is affected by {{ai|Nether Grasp|Malzahar}}.

r1.blurb: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion over a zone of damaging negative energy.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Malzahar''' {{tip|channels}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds, during which the target is {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}}, {{tip|suppression|suppressed}}, and dealt {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
A ''Null Zone'' is opened beneath the target that lasts 5 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} every half-second to all enemies within.
'''''Malzahar''' may prematurely end the ability after {{fd|0.5}} seconds by performing an action.''
leveling: {{st|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|125 to 275}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}|Damage Per 0.25 Seconds|{{ap|125/10 to 275/10}} {{as|(+ 8% AP)}}}}

{{st|Total Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|10 to 20}}% {{as|(+ {{fd|2.5}}% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}|Damage Per Half-Second|{{as|{{ap|10/10 to 20/10}}% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.25}}% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}}}
r1.name: Nether Grasp
notes: * Performing an action can go from moving to casting other abilities.
** ''Summoner Spells'' and ''Item Actives'' can be used without interrupting it (excluding {{si|Flash}}, {{si|Teleport}}, {{ii|Zhonya's Hourglass}} and items that make him move).
* ''Nether Grasp'' and ''Null Zone'' count as two different abilities for effects such as {{ri|Electrocute}}.
